content: double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet repeat from * around 36 double_crochet 18 chain-1 spaces round 5 chain 1 single_crochet in same double_crochet single_crochet in ea double_crochet and ea space around 54 single_crochet round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet single_crochet in ea single_crochet around 54 single_crochet 2 round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet *single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 63 single_crochet round 8 chain 3 double_crochet in same single_crochet chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet *1 double_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet chain 1 skip 1 single_crochet repeat from * around skipping last 2 single_crochet at end before joining with slip_stitch 42 double_crochet 21 chain-1 sps round 9 chain 1 single_crochet in each double_crochet and chain-1 space around join with slip_stitch 63 single_crochet round 10-11 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join with a slip_stitch 63 single_crochet round 12 chain 3 double_crochet in next single_crochet chain 1 skip next single_crochet *1 double_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet chain 1 skip next single_crochet repeat from * around join with a slip_stitch 42 double_crochet 21 chain-1 sps rnds 13-15 chain 1 single_crochet in each double_crochet and chain-1 space around join with slip_stitch 63 single_crochet repeat rnds 12-15 until hat measures 7 from beg or to desired length fasten_off and weave in ends copyright 2017 2006 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 3
